84787.「すばらしい！ \n これでスタンプが貯まったカードが\n <%dM_CardN:
Wonderfully done! That makes
<%dM_CardNum> card(s) with all stamps earned.
<bw_break>

84788.「よし。これで スタンプが貯まったカードが \n <%dM_CardNum>枚:
You've filled out the stamps on <%dM_CardNum> of your cards, I see.
Very well! Your reward, as promised!

84793.「定められたクエストを こなしてきたようだな。 \n よし スタンプを押そう。\:
You've been busy completing more of your
quests, I see. Very well! Allow me to stamp
your card!
<end>

86460.「むむっ。オーグリード大陸のカードに \n スタンプが すべて 押されたようじゃ:
You've earned all stamps on your Ogreed card! Well done!
Ah, Ogreed... I wonder how Magnus is doing. He serves at Gartlant Castle, you know.
He's actually a distant relative of my wife. In his youth, he studied politics here under Lady Lushenda.

86461.「むむっ。ウェナ諸島のカードに \n スタンプが すべて 押されたようじゃ！\n:
... It seems all the cards from the Wenatchee Islands have been stamped! The Wenna Islands. I trust Lord Meru is in good health? When he
was still a member of the Order of the Magi, he came to this country on a mission. I had the honor of studying his swordplay.

86462.「むむっ。エルトナ大陸のカードに \n スタンプが すべて 押されたようじゃ！\:
... Looks like all the stamps are on the cards in Eltona! The continent of Eltona... Has Dr. Hanetzki's research come to fruition?
..... I don't know her directly, but I've read a paper she wrote... I've read some of her work.

86463.「むむっ。ドワチャッカ大陸のカードに \n スタンプが すべて 押されたようじゃ:
... It looks like all the stamps have been placed on the Dwachaqa continent card! The Dwachaqa continent... I'd love to adopt their
transporter mechanism... The castle and town of Granzedorra are too large... I'm too old for this kind of travel...

86464.「むむっ。プクランド大陸のカードに \n スタンプが すべて 押されたようじゃ！:
... It looks like all the cards in Pukland have been stamped! Pukland... I've heard that there's a wonderful tower there called the
Wondrous Windmill Tower. I'd hoped to take the whole family to see it, but now I'm afraid it's a dream come true...

86465.「むむっ。レンダーシアのカードに \n スタンプが すべて 押されたようじゃ！\:
Hmm! You've stamped everything on the Lendersia Card!
I have heard the news of your deeds throughout Lendersia.
I would like to give my utmost thanks on behalf of all who live in this land. Thank you so much, .

86466.「おお なんと！ レンダーシアⅡのカードに \n スタンプが すべて 押されたよ:
Oh, my! It seems that all the stamps have been applied to the cards of Lenderia II! At this point, it would not be an exaggeration
to say that your work has preserved order in Lendencia! We are not to be outdone... However, in order to lead Rendershia to a
better path, we must continue to rely on your help...

86467.「おおっ レンダーシアⅢのカードに\n スタンプが すべて 押されたようではない:
Oh, it looks like all the stamps have been applied to the cards of Lendermere III! What a wonderful thing! Perhaps I should call you
the savior of Lendermere from now on... My eyes were right when I entrusted you with the stamp card... I think I'm getting a little
high!

86468.アリオス王は レンダーシアカードに\nスタンプを ひとつ 押した！\n<end>:
King Arios stamps a single stamp on the
Lendersia Card!
<end>

87618.「……ふむ。どうやら 新たに \n こなしてきたクエストは ないようだな。\n:
..... Apparently, there are no new quests to
complete. I couldn't get the stamp...<bw_break>
